name: Choose Groove
description:
Stereo headphones required

Choose Groove is a game entirely focused on audio and music. Create your own song by moving around in the room to collect the instruments and melodies that you hear. You need stereo headphones to play.

Controls:

Keyboard arrows or D-pad on a gamepad.


Credits:
  • Composer: Julien Monaki Nicot
  • Sound Design: Quentin Krug Bass
  • Coding: Francis «narF» Sheridan Paré
  • Logo: Kamylle


Links

Repository Link: https://github.com/narFnarF/GGJ2017-Choose-Groove
